name: Balmy Pass
description:
Balmy Pass was created for the VIMJAM 3 hosted by Vimlark and 8-bits to infinity. The player controls multiple platforms in order to get villagers across a chasm filled with lava. As the game continues the volcano starts heating up and the player has to navigate the changing landscape to keep the villagers safe.

Known bug: Using the mouse to on the main menu for level select will throw you onto a random level. This can be avoided by moving your mouse to the corner and using the arrow keys/space to select in this menu.

All gameplay, sound, and artwork were made in ten days during the VIMJAM 3 time period.

For the villagers screams, I had my friends yell into their microphones and I added a bit of reverb so shout out to those boys.

Also, check me out on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCO7OIFeVNhEExucoi7pvZLA

I'll be posting a devlog on this game soon but as of writing this, its 3 am on a Sunday and I have to work tomorrow...

Thank you for checking out Balmy Pass!
